overview: Sleepless Nights is an American 2019 Short film Directed by Ivory J. Taylor Starring Kylie Blackwell.  The film is about Olivia a young girl thinking about the mysterious man she met at her prom night, after dancing the night away with Him she since starting getting feelings for him. After weeks pass by with no messages or calls back she start to go down a dark path with no sleep and starts suffering from depression. Will she ever be the same again?
tagline: Sleepless Nights 2019, Mysterious Movies, 2019 Movies, Short Films,
title: Sleepless Nights
